title: RD - The Verdict Is In
itunes:title: RD - The Verdict Is In
description:
Adam and Mark connect right after the verdict came down in the Kyle Rittenhouse trial.  They discuss the verdict as well as what might be next for Kyle and what possible legal outlets he may be exploring.  They also discuss some developments in the James O'Keefe case as he continues to spar with the New York Times over their stories that he alleges the FBI leaked to them.
